prompt: Create a 404 Not Found page with a deep blue background (Colors.blue[900]). Display '404' in bold white (Colors.white, font size 78). Show 'Page Not Found' in light blue (Colors.blue[200], font size 28, semi-bold). Include a message 'This page is missing or has been moved.' in white (Colors.white70, font size 16). Add a white 'Home' button with rounded corners (borderRadius: 10) and blue text (Colors.blue[900]). Use a Column layout with mainAxisAlignment.center and crossAxisAlignment.center. Place a circular progress indicator (CircularProgressIndicator, color: Colors.blue[200]) above the '404' text. Apply padding of 24.0 on all sides. Use a Scaffold with the deep blue background.
